description:
Just Dance® 2020 is the ultimate dance game with 40 hot tracks from chart-topping hits like “Old Town Road (Remix)” by Lil Nas X Ft. Billy Ray Cyrus and “God Is A Woman” by Ariana Grande. Keep the party going for hours with songs for the whole family to enjoy!

40 Hot New Tracks: Keep the party going with the latest hits like “Old Town Road (Remix)” by Lil Nas X Ft. Billy Ray Cyrus.

Free Just Dance® Unlimited: Dance to 500+ of your favorite songs!  A free one-month trial is included with every purchase.

Choose Your Favorite Songs: Create your own playlists to customize your Just Dance parties!

Kids Mode: Enjoy eight new kid-friendly songs, offering a fun experience for our youngest players.  

Play Co-op with Friends: Dance to our newest universes and beat the high score together.
name: Just Dance® 2020
